pullRequest.title: Refactor RLStatement and TCLStatement to different dialect Statement
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ref #7170.
Changes proposed in this pull request:

Refactor RLStatement and TCLStatement to different dialect Statement

commit.message: Refactor RLStatement and TCLStatement to different dialect Statement

nodes.bodyText: Do you think it is better to move TCLStatement to its father class SetAutoCommitStatement if they extend the same abstract class?

commit.message: move TCLStatement to abstract statement class
